meanings.definition: The state of being without a fence.
meanings.sent1: The fencelessnesses of the yard allowed the dog to roam freely.
meanings.sent2: The fencelessnesses of the property made it challenging to keep the livestock contained.
meanings.sent3: The fencelessnesses of the garden led to a surprise visit from some curious rabbits.
meanings.sent4: In the vast fencelessnesses of the countryside, one could feel truly unrestricted.
meanings.sent5: The fencelessnesses of the open field created a sense of endless possibilities.

meanings.definition: The quality of lacking boundaries or barriers.
meanings.sent1: The fencelessnesses of her thoughts made it hard to focus on one idea.
meanings.sent2: The fencelessnesses of the ocean seemed to stretch infinitely into the horizon.
meanings.sent3: His fencelessnesses in following rules often got him into trouble.
meanings.sent4: The fencelessnesses of her imagination knew no limits.
meanings.sent5: The fencelessnesses of the sky at night was filled with twinkling stars.
